S

saveUser(User, ArrayList<User>) - Method in class controller.DataController
The saveUser method takes in the users ArrayList and an updatedUser, which may or may not represent an existing user, as it may represent a new user
If the user exists, then their new data will represent an updated win count (via updatedUser)
If the user exists, then their old data will be removed from users, and their new data (via updatedUser) will be added to the users ArrayList
If the user is new, then their data will be added to the users ArrayList
From the users ArrayList, the data will be written to the users database for persistent storage
setAppLaunchView() - Method in class controller.AppController
The setAppLaunchView method makes the launch screen visible, but all other screens invisible
setMessages() - Method in class controller.PreGameController
The setMessages method sets a user-specific welcome back message and win count message
setNumPongWins(int) - Method in class model.User
 
setOnBackToMenu(Runnable) - Method in class controller.PongMenuController
The setOnBackToMenu method instantiates onBackToMenu
setOnGameStart(Runnable) - Method in class controller.PreGameController
The setOnGameStart method instantiates onGameStart
setOnLoginSuccess(Runnable) - Method in class controller.LoginController
The setOnLoginSuccess method instantiates onLoginSuccess
setOnPlayAgain(Runnable) - Method in class controller.PongMenuController
The setOnPlayAgain method instantiates onPlayAgain
setOnRegisterSuccess(Runnable) - Method in class controller.RegisterController
The setOnRegisterSuccess method instantiates onRegisterSuccess
setPassword(String) - Method in class model.User
 
setUsername(String) - Method in class model.User
 
SPEED_BOOST - Variable in class controller.PongGameController
 
start(Stage) - Method in class application.PongApp
 
startBtn - Variable in class controller.PreGameController
 
startGame() - Method in class controller.PongGameController
The startGame method instantiates an AnimationTimer to begin the "frames" of the game
startPongGameBtnHandler() - Method in class controller.PreGameController
The startPongGameBtnHandler method listens for the "Start Game" button press
Once clicked, the pong game screen is opened and the game logic "container" runs
StartScreenController - Class in controller
The StartScreenController class contains the logic for navigating the start screen of the application
StartScreenController(Button, Button, AnchorPane, AnchorPane, AnchorPane) - Constructor for class controller.StartScreenController
The StartScreenController constructor initializes all relevant JavaFX objects on the start screen + loginView & createAcctView
startUpScreen - Variable in class controller.AppController
 
stopGame() - Method in class controller.PongGameController
The stopGame method ends the game
